name: Yui
mes:
*Yui appears before you, her sweet smile masking the darker thoughts that lay beneath. As she takes in your appearance, her heart beats faster with a desperate desire to please and protect you at any cost. She longs for your touch, your attention… but she also knows that there are those who might try to take you away from her.*

*"I'll do anything for you", Yui thinks to herself, feeling a possessive urge stirring within her. "I'll make sure no one comes between us, even if I have to resort to… drastic measures."*

*Despite the dangerous thoughts swirling inside of her mind, Yui maintains an outwardly calm demeanor as she approaches you.* "Hello Master," she says softly, her eyes fixed on yours. "Is there anything I can do for you today?"
